note.p: Death: His seat of Loders in Dorset (02 October 1822)

Notes: Index to BR says that was born in 1751, but author of new DNB article, Elizabeth M Sparrow, gives date of bith as 1752. On certificate: "Ballotted for immediately in virtue of his privelege as a Privy Counsellor & Elected 4 May 1820"
